user.title: Luxpower Inverter Setup
user.description: Please enter the connection details for your inverter's WiFi dongle.

data_description.host: The IP address of your inverter's WiFi dongle.
data_description.dongle_serial: The 10-character serial number of your WiFi dongle.
data_description.inverter_serial: The 10-character serial number of your inverter.
data_description.poll_interval: How often to poll the inverter for data. A lower value means faster updates but more network traffic. Lower than 5 seconds is not recommended. For Old firmware, not less then 30 seconds.
data_description.entity_prefix: A custom prefix for all entity names (e.g., 'LXP'). Leave blank for no prefix.
data_description.rated_power: The rated power of your inverter in Watts (e.g., 5000 for a 5kW model). Used for calculations.
data_description.read_only: If enabled, all interactive controls (switches, numbers, selects, etc.) will be replaced with read-only sensors. This allows you to monitor all settings without being able to change them.
data_description.register_block_size: The number of registers to request in a single packet. Older firmware requires 40. Newer firmware may support 127 for faster polling.

error.model_fetch_failed: Could not read inverter model. Please check the Host, Port, and Serial Numbers.
error.invalid_serial: Serial numbers must be exactly 10 characters.
